feed.title: NocoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.2: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Error executing webhook: TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'workspace_id') #10268
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: unable to deploy nocodb frontend url on remote srver #10262
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: #10261
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: NOCODB + OpenID Connect for education/non-commercial #10253
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Has Many Link - Add new record error: "Update not allowed for table which doesn't have primary Key" #10249
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Not sure if this is a bug or missing feature but in the New UI there is no global Audit #10238
  • [closed] Edit Access after selecting Share #10205
  • [🔎 Status: More Info Needed] 🐛 Bug: Cannot login after a fresh start #10125
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: database audit missing #10101
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: adding a new mysql data source requires db user with create database permission #9990
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: No history of modifications #9880
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Modification History Tracking #9549
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Investigate bulk update #9117
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Bulk update is not shown in the audit log. #8964
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Updates Committed to Data Source while being keyed in but before being committed to NocoDB #5895
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Improve audit logs to properly show REST API calls #2030

What's Changed

  • Release 0.260.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10242
  • fix: missing file references index by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10245
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10243
  • Nc fix(nc-gui): grid view blank screen issue on scroll by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10236
  • Nc feat/api v3 by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10219
  • fix: add missing indexes by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10247
  • Nc refactor/audit logs by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10145
  • feat: redis helper by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10252
  • Nc feat/expanded form discussion mode by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10212
  • fix: accessibility issues by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10248
  • fix: long text data disappear by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10256
  • fix(nc-gui): grid row visibility issue in mobile view by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10257
  • test(extension-marketplace): marketplace test funcs by @amandesai01 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9966
  • fix: fields menu reload by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10259
  • fix: upload modal data only headers by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10258
  • fix: dynamic ref by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10240
  • feat(nc-gui): New Barcode/QR Code UI/UX by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10254
  • fix: Mark as new record while creating new record from links list by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10265
  • chore: nc sync by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10218
  • Nc refactor(nc-gui): RichText follow up by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10251
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10266
  • feat: better json editing ux by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10263
  • fix: fix searching the linked records of a new record in expanded/form by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10250
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10270
  • fix: avoid create db call on connect existing external by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10267
  • fix: properly null check for apiMeta by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10244
  • Fix: Misc Issues by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10269
  • fix: Webhook log insertion bug by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10272
  • 0.260.2 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10273

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.1...0.260.2

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.5: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: DATESTR function is not available for your database #10377
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Data deletion bug when filtering and selecting all records #10375
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Trying to edit any field in kanban view causes cursor to move into date field. #10374
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: NocoDB not starting after update to latest version #10355
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: lookup field are limited to 25 ! #10354
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: hash mismatch in Nix build #10339
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: MySQL as ExtSource- Allow using text instead of set when using select fields #10338
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Deserialization Error on Minio plugin - fresh upstall #10332
  • [closed] Free Vulnerability Code Review for Your GitHub Repository #10327
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Installation script fails to retrieve external IP address due to HTML response from ifconfig.co #10320
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Rename table #10313
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Option to Enable Paginated View #10292
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'findIndex') - error updating a linked field in the kanban view #10283
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Webhook is sent out of date. #10281
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Disorder in hidden fields on kanban cards. #10276
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Meta sync not working for postgres db integration #10255
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Link field API response issue #10222
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Can't use "field summary" in a "group by" view #10221
  • [closed] cannot create source via api #10178
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Roll-up sum of formula #10144
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Cannot use OVH S3 Plugin: "Invalid Region: region was not a valid dns name" #9942
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Question mark isn't automatically escaped in REGEX_EXTRACT #9847
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Formula to linked formula which is primary #9812
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Delete Webhook Payload only visible Columns #9778
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Webhook doesnt fire when a relation gets updated #9763
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'date_format') while update external PG table #9731
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Support the import of CSV files with non-UTF-8 encodings. #9634
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: difference between time field is in JSON format #9511
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: "T is not iterable" when trying to delete records #9307
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Introduce Bulk Delete button for attachment fields #9282
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: record audit logs as date and time instead of "days and hours ago" #9106
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Inquiry about the completeness and openness of the nc-help library #9012
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Many-to-many relationships are not deleted when deleting a record #8366
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Adding rows in middle of the table #8196
  • [🔎 Status: More Info Needed] 🐛 Bug: copy record url in detail view not working #7117
  • [👋 For : Community or Good First Issue] Doesn't create relations from Postgresql DB #719
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Button open url with dynamic url based on attachment field #10419
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Drag Indicator in Single-Select and Multi-Select is scrambled #10409
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Editor shouldn't be able to modify form schema #10360
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Cannot HEAD /dashboard #10337
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Minio endpoint name can't have underscore #10334
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Column name changes after using SingleSelect #8606
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: csv upload into field set to duration fails #8358
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Allow rollup also for linked formula fields #7975
  • [📞 Status: Need Internal Discussion] 🔦 Feature: Enable LTAR #7053
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Allow using values from has-many child tables in webhooks #4481
  • [✨ Type: Enhancement][🔦 Type: Feature][🍰 Scope : Column] [Feature] Use Formula result in Rollup #3014
  • [✨ Type: Enhancement][🔦 Type: Feature][🍰 Scope : Column] [Feature] Use rollup in formula #1331
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 [Import CSV] Bug: Script error : "cannot read properties of undefined" when using pagination #1297
  • [🔦 Type: Feature][🚘 Scope : Automation] Feature : log automations #313

What's Changed

  • Release 0.260.3 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10396
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10397
  • Update runner os to ubuntu-22.04 by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10399
  • chore: Update runner os to ubuntu-22.04 by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10400
  • 0.260.4 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10401
  • Release 0.260.4 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10402
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10403
  • chore(github/workflow/bumper): switch to the new nix runner by @sinanmohd in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10405
  • chore(github/workflow/bumper): fixes by @sinanmohd in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10408
  • fix: Add help text for hostname error in Minio by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10412
  • Nc hook logs by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10404
  • fix: avoid lazy loading of typeable editor cell component by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10416
  • fix: mask creds on get by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10361
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10413
  • Nc data audit enable by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10426
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10427
  • fix: Include foreign key if system fields is enabled at view level by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10414
  • fix: support japanese, chinese and cryillic letters by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10428
  • fix : escape parentheses on filter from API by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10415
  • 0.260.5 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10430

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.3...0.260.5

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.6: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Filter by date not working after update to 0.260.5 #10447
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: realtime updating #10440
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: cannot use search by fields with Russian names #10439
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: null doesn't work #10438
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Trying to edit any field in kanban view causes cursor to move into date field #10424
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: log in page of app.nocodb.com is blank #9552

What's Changed

  • Release 0.260.5 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10431
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10432
  • fix internationalization by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10434
  • fix: Add whitespace support in where query param parser by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10436
  • fix (nocodb-sdk): Handle suboperator on logical level, more language support by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10441
  • fix: attachment null by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10444
  • fix: condition for attachment check by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10446
  • Nc fix/date filter bug by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10445
  • chore: bump package versions by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10437
  • Nc fix/progress meta sync by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10448
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10450
  • fix: cache calculated value by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10455
  • fix: rollback the query filter to previous implementation by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10454
  • 0.260.6 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10456

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.5...0.260.6

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.7: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: API updates are altering records not included in the payload. #10473
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: limit Parameter Ignored in REST API #10435
  • [closed] Bug: Rollup a formula field #10429
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Formula that evaluates to boolean #9815
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Private minio cannot be used to download attachments #9590

What's Changed

  • fix: worker monaco by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10462
  • fix: Bulk update - order record list same as input data by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10476
  • fix: send table alias for rollup when column is formula by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10478
  • fix (nc-gui): false readonly checkbox still show empty square by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10468
  • refactor: add unsynced changes from ee by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10486
  • fix: broken is requested logic by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10472

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.6...0.260.7

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.262.0: NocoDB Grid 2.0 – Built for Speed, Even on Old Windows & Raspberry Pi!!
entry.content:
🚀 NocoDB : Feature Release

We heard you! Performance was a challenge, especially on older Windows systems and browsers. So, we completely rebuilt the NocoDB grid for an ultra-fast, seamless experience—even on Raspberry Pi setups.

What’s Changed?

  • :rocket: Rebuilt from the ground up – Say goodbye to sluggish interactions.
  • 🖼️ Canvas-powered rendering – No bloat, just pure speed.
  • :dash: Ultra-smooth on old Windows machines – Performance that just works.
  • :strawberry: Runs even on Raspberry Pi – Handle data anywhere, with no slowdowns.
  • :zap: We’re making NocoDB faster, leaner, and future-ready—so you can work without limits!

This is just the beginning of our performance journey. Try it out and experience the smoothest NocoDB grid yet! :rocket:

🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Excel import error - Parameter 1 is not of type 'Blob' #10499
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Since NocoDB Version 0.260 attachment in mp3 format not playable #10492
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Geo data input NOT work from 0.260.6 #10487
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Unable To Re-Order Image Attachments: Results In Error "Field To Parse Image Data". #10483
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Search across all fields #10463
  • [trigger-CI] 🐛 Bug: Broken REST API in Russian language #10433
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Lookup field creation via fields menu fails #10423
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Invalid Email throws error when validation enabled #10422
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Cannot scroll through base views on touchscreen devices, it reorders views instead #10346
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: In firefox, scrolling vertically in a record view is not available #10319
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Fist field in new table (Title) is not editable #10548
  • [closed] missing projects after changing redis to valkey #10530
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Alt + Left Arrow Shortcut Causes Data Loss #10513
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Excel import error - Parameter 1 is not of type 'Blob' #10499
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Since NocoDB Version 0.260 attachment in mp3 format not playable #10492
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Geo data input NOT work from 0.260.6 #10487
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Unable To Re-Order Image Attachments: Results In Error "Field To Parse Image Data". #10483
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: No auto attribution of columns if special characters when importing from file #10482
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Cards with blocked movement in kanban view (when the view mode is locked) #10481
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Search across all fields #10463
  • [trigger-CI] 🐛 Bug: Broken REST API in Russian language #10433
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Lookup field creation via fields menu fails #10423
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Invalid Email throws error when validation enabled #10422
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Cannot scroll through base views on touchscreen devices, it reorders views instead #10346
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: In firefox, scrolling vertically in a record view is not available #10319

What's Changed

  • fix: port in use on code change by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10507
  • Nc fix/image attachment reordering by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10493
  • make entire square clickable treat mp3 as video by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10501
  • can move cards if view is locked by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10510
  • make the video player has auto height instead of 100% by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10508
  • fix (nc-gui): fix url import and json string import by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10503
  • chore: sync import ft by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10509
  • Nc fix(nc-gui): Lookup field creation via fields menu fails by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10512
  • feat: add query based filter support in view url by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10511
  • feat: cloud exp by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10504
  • Nc feat/auto add select option by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10517
  • refactor: add type definitions to formula query builders by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10479
  • chore: sync various by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10519
  • feat: Improved Grid View by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10520
  • fix: feature preview height to be same as toolbar by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10522
  • fix: block api token access to meta-diff by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10480
  • fix: square bracket rich text by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10526
  • Nc fix(nc-gui): disable draggable/sortable component reordering in touch based devices by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10505
  • Nc fix/rich perf by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10528
  • feat: optimize number of api calls by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10525
  • fix(nc-gui): instead of rendering multiple lookup attachment cell render only 1 by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10518
  • fix(nc-gui): expand row issue in canvas by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10535
  • docs: update comments for coming soon items by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10537
  • feat: enable canvas for mobile mode by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10536
  • fix: edit interaction for url, date and attachment by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10539
  • Nc feat/canvas formula url by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10541
  • fix(nc-gui): disable expanded form keyboard navigation if any input is active/focused by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10551
  • Nc canvas fixes 2 by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10545
  • fix: mouseup listener not working properly by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10552
  • fix: canvas related issues by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10538

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.7...0.262.0
